content:
I think there might be some confusion! Emma Thompson is a renowned actress, not a jazz pianist. But I'm happy to help you with tracking venues on Songkick!

Yes, you can definitely track specific venues on Songkick. Here's how:

1. **Search for the venue**: On Songkick, search for the name of the local music hall where you saw Emma Thompson (the actress) perform. You can also search for other venues that host outdoor concerts or festivals.
2. **Track the venue**: Once you find the venue, click on its profile page and click the "Track" button. This will add the venue to your tracked list.
3. **Get notifications**: Whenever an event is announced at that venue, Songkick will send you a notification. You'll receive alerts for all upcoming events at that venue, including outdoor concerts and festivals.
4. **Filter by venue type**: When searching for events, you can filter by "Venue" to see only events at your tracked venues. This way, you can focus on outdoor concerts and festivals at your favorite venues.

By tracking venues, you'll stay up-to-date on upcoming events and can plan ahead to catch your favorite artists or discover new ones at your favorite outdoor concert spots!

Tip: You can also use Songkick's "Venues Near Me" feature to discover new venues in your area and track them for upcoming events.
